page.title: 04 LIVING IN BARNES AVENUE
page.content: }}}}}BARNES AVENUE IS A QUIET ROAD WITH PLEASANT AND KIND PEOPLE. IT HAS A GOOD SEAVIEW FROM THE BALCONIES.THESE BALCONIES ARE MADE FROM WOOD AND IRON WHICH ARE BEAUTIFULLY DECORATED.THIS AVENUE IS LINED WITH TREES.THEIR ARE BEAUTIFULLY KEPTED FLOWERS IN THE GARDEN. THE ROADS ARE MADE FROM STONE BUT THEIR ARE NOT MANY DRAINS. THEIR ARE 24 SEMI-DETACHED,20 DETACHED,A TOTAL OF 44 ALTOGETHER. A LOCAL RESIDENT OF THIS ROAD TOLD US THAT SHE HAD LIVED THERE FOR 14 YEARS AND KNOWN ABOUT 10 FAMILIES THAT LIVE DOWN THE STREET.SHE LIKES IT THERE BECAUSE IT IS QUIET AND NEAR THE SEA.SHE SAID THE PAVEMENTS SHOULD BE REPAIRED AND NEED A GOOD SWEEPING. THERE IS QUITE A LOT OF PETS IN BARNES AVE. THERE IS A MIXED AGE GROUP OF YOUNG AND OLD WHO ARE VERY FRIENDLY.
